channel.title: HumidityX 667/720 Official Release
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/hx3ygx.jpg[/img]
[b]Good Evening,
The reason I took along time was because I was waiting for my unban which is now sorted. Finally, After working since November 2011 on my source, I am going to release it because I'm going back to 614 Development. In this source there are 5 Anti leeches.
I do NOT want anyone leeching my source, that is the reason I included them. I do NOT give permission to ANYONE re releasing a fixed version of my source or releasing my source anywhere but Rune-Server. I have a reputation on Rune-Server so my source must remain on Rune-Server. Hint for one of the anti leeches: "Libs" Good luck everyone :)[/b]
[b]The download link is a package of my source, client, cache, forums files, cache stuff; this includes, item editors, sprite editors, packers, cache downloaders and so so much more hence it's 1.2GB. It's got previous cache versions inside it aswell. There are exactly 10 different cache tools.[/b]
[u][b]Package Download:[/b][/u] https://dl.dropbox.com/u/56253021/HumidityX%20667-720.rar
[u][b]Separate Downloads[/b][/u]
[u][b]Source[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/p1cowqh2463d/Server.rar
[u][b]Client[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/mccq68rw1fp6/Client.rar
[u][b]Cache[/b][/u] http://uppit.com/bzwwvukdji99/cache.rar
[u][b]Development Log & Features[/b][/u] [code]2011/2012 3rd November 2011: Baught my first 667 for 15M RSGP. 5th November 2011: Added A Few Good Snippets In 17th November 2011: Fixed Gpi (The Fix Everyone Was Craving For) 18-29th November 2011: Gave up, went back to 639 lol. 30th November 2011: My Birthday. (Turned 14) 4th December 2011: Released EyreScape639 (My Old Source) 5th December 2011: Came Back and re started developing. 7th December 2011: Worked on yell handling but gave up. 10th December 2011: Re Written Classes. 19th December 2011: Found out how to load cache lol :) 7th January 2012: Started Hosting got 700+ Registered players and 30 online. 2nd February 2012: Released some tutorials for players to follow. 16th February 2012: Fixed up Dupes, Bonuses, Xp Rates, Skilling, and minigames. 17th February 2012: Worked on Object handling which I got right and loading 681. 25th March 2012: Use Lots of classes off of Disturbed v1. 26th March 2012: Changed Home, Npc Locations and more. 30th March 2012: Worked with optimusscape (Chronic) produced some good work. 1st April 2012: Really got into developing, put my head down and worked. 6th April 2012: Implemented 15+ Classes by now. 7th April 2012: Made Unpacking/Packing Definitions, Drops, Spawns, Bonuses 8th April 2012: Added PvP tokens And Donator Shop. 11th April 2012: Worked on re writting skilling and combat. 15th April 2012: Made Server Messages. 20th April 2012: Somewhere around here got banned for malicious content. 30th April 2012: Got unbanned because I didn't know about it and removed it. 1st May 2012: Made Trillions of useful/helpful commands/shops. 2nd May 2012: Added A Fully Functional PvP System. 3rd May 2012: Added Portals and implemented a rewarding system 4th May 2012: HumidityX shutdown coz of constant hacking by the 667 hacker. 5th May 2012: Spent ages trying to find fix but didn't :( 6th May 2012: InventoryOptionsHandling, ButtonHandling, and fixed trade. 7th May 2012: Implemented Flower Game And Dicing Classes. 8th May 2012: Fixed up prices of items ingame (list is never ending lol). 9th May 2012: Re Done Alot of Classes and added trillions of stuff... 10-20th May 2012: Done Finishing Touches Now Loading 717! 25th May 2012: Erica & Beta give me a few good snippets and tools to use. 26th May 2012: Used Beta's & Erica Item Editor And Sprite Editor. 27th May 2012: Carried on and edited Game Frame, Items and more... 28th May 2012: Chilling Out! :D 29th May 2012: Now Loading 718! 4th June 2012: Fixing Up Small Bugs 5th June 2012: Cache Sided Editing... Sprites, Items etc... 6th June 2012: Fight pits and fight caves near completion... 7th June 2012: Working on soul wars. 8th June 2012: working on clan wars. 9th June 2012: word censoring almost done. 10th June 2012: Worked on a last logged in from "Ip". 11th June 2012: Double xp weekends, double pk token events etc... 12th June 2012: Gambling System. 13th June 2012: Crystal Chest. 14th June 2012: more npc's added and dialogues. 15th June 2012: Working on quests. 16th June 2012: better training areas. 17th June 2012: Revenants with PvP arm drops. 18th June 2012: Safe Portal (Pking). 19th June 2012: working on a dialogue that repairs armours. 20th June 2012: more familiars added and finished summoning scripts. 21st June 2012: Farming. 22nd June 2012: Construction. 23rd June 2012: Dungeoneering. 24th June 2012: Started Grand Exchange. 25th June 2012: Adding Grand Exchange Handlers. 26th June 2012: Finished Grand Exchange. 27th June 2012: Frost Dragons added and Frost dragon bones. 28th June 2012: Administrators not being able to trade. 29th June 2012: Working on V-Bulletin official website and a mysql system. 30th June 2012: finished vote4cash, auto donate & almost finished highscores. 1st July 2012: Web development. 2nd July 2012: Gfx For Server Logo & Support Sig 3rd July 2012: My Whole host, email and all my databases get hacked. 4th July 2012: Restarting on IPB Official Forums and MySQL. 5th July 2012: Finished all recent updates and forums, releasing new client out to players and eco reset. 6th July 2012: Almost finished off all database's. 7th July 2012: Made SafePvP give you 1 Pk token and Danger Zones 25 Pk Tokens. 8th July 2012: Fixing some glitches and bugs. 9th July 2012: All my databases get hacked and my vps taken down ^.^ 10th July 2012: Trying to regain access. 11th July 2012: Looking for a new vps. 12th July 2012: Stopped development until further notice. 15th July 2012: Starting 614 Development 21st July 2012: Date Of Official HumidityX 667/720 Release.[/code]
[u][b]Previous Media[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/s2z884.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5x8m6c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2mqw1av.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ayvbwl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2yo7ubr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ronspx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/e04b61.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/w7fv61.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n9x4dg.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[u][b]New Media[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23qywqc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/295e39z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/25incwm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/spympg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rgdu7p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/do9yx4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/iqfw9j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5z3fb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/11hwh36.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2a9yyqu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/14tv6sy.png[/img]
[u][b]Staff Commands:[/b][/u] [code]Owner Commands:
tele unstuck item giveitem setlevelother configloop god commands2 shop clanwars testdung checkdisplay changedisplay colour look dung cutscene summon pouch fishme scroll coords itemoni setlevel npc tonpc spawnplayer object tab tabses killme changepassother setrights setotherdeaths setkills setdeaths inters hidec string istringl istring iconfig config configf hit iloop tloop configloop testo2 objectanim bconfigloop reset level master bconfig inter empty interh inters teleaway kill getpassword permdonator monthdonator takedonator check reloadfiles tele restart shutdown emote remote quake spec trylook tryinter tryanim trygfx gfx mess unpermban permban ipban unipban checkip getip mute jail unjail unmute ban unban kick lock unlock staffyell staffmeeting
Administrator Commands:
tele unstuck item configloop prayertest karamja shop clanwars checkdisplay changedisplay colour look dung cutscene summon pouch fishme scroll coords itemoni setlevel reset level master empty teleaway bank emote remote quake tryanim trylook trygfx gfx mess unpermban unipban staffmeeting
Moderator Commands:
sound music teleto teletome staffzone sendhome ticket mute unmute jail unjail ban unban kick yell staffyell[/code]
[u][b]Jad Configurations[/b][/u] [code]Jad id: 2745
Melee: 16204 Fast(range): 16202 Slow(mage): 16195 Block: 16201 Turn black: 16197 Death: 16188
Gfx:
1625 range stomp 1626 : making of the mage projectile 1627 : mage pojectile 451 : range projectile from the sky 157 : hit on the player gfx 444 heal[/code]
[u][b]Webclient Applet[/b][/u] [code]<applet name="HumidityX" width="765" height="503" archive="DROPBOX LINK" code="Loader.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>[/code]
[u][b]Credits:[/b][/u] [b]Humid (Me - For Overall Developing) Chronic (My Friend/Developer) Erica (Few Good Tools To Use) Tizen (Helping With Classes) Beta (Few Good Snippets To Use) Ramo518 (My Gfx Designer) Disturbed 704 V1 (For Classes Off Of Base) Maffiarpg (Web Sided Development) Method (RuneScape Cache Downloader) Dragonkk (Cache tools) Legitimate (718 Item Editor) SytaxFTW ($149 monthly vps for 6 months)[/b]
-------------------------------------------
[b][u]HumidityX Biography[/u]
To Be honest with you; On my projects: 317 377 428 503 508 525 614 I've just leached. Back in September I got my first 639 Source and I never really understood the lower revisions so I actually started coding for real since then and learning. Yes I was the owner of EyreScape639 and people to this day still use my release such as RawrScape & QuantumX. My Old name was Fox and my old server name was EyreScape.
Back In November I moved onto the FIRST EVER 667 on which today I still have that this is. A player named "thebacon" sold me the source and his friend can decompile clients so he gave me the decompiled Matrix client. I was one of the top 5 people to get it the earliest possible. Back then I payed for my 667 for $25 because I've always loved the higher revisions and were the only revisions I could use dispite the fact that other Rune-Server players would tell me to start at a 317. Now I have enhanced my knowledge, I'm not the best coder and like a human; yes I do get stuck but I literally love programming to the Extreme and would love to learn more and more. It would be kind of you guys to set me up with a few tips if possible and I literally ask for nothing more. You respect me and I respect you.
Since I got my 667 now for 11 months I have been working on my source and if you see my source layout like my classes, txt and java files It's totally different from when I got my source back then. I'll probably never release my source for another year or two (depends) however when I do release it, I would love people to take the oppertunity of my source and learn to program like I did. At the moment it's all Trial and error for me and as I mentioned above I would love some useful/helpful tips.
During my time with 667s I got the new client (matrix) which had malicious content in it which I was un aware of and I got banned on Rune-Server. I honestly didn't know about it, Mister Maggot my good friend removed it for me and since that day I have been unbanned, not to mention; I've never ever broken a rule on Rune-Server. I hope everyone appriciates my work like I do to theirs. You will most likeley never see me put a harrasfull post on a reply to a thread or another post or even anywhere because it's just the person I am. I treat people the way I'd like to be treated. I would just like to say thank you to all my friends in my programming/Rune-Server experiance so far; Erica, Beta, Vincent, Vin, Gf_u, Rudie, Eric (Fatality614), Chronic, Coombser (Old 317 Developer), Scu11, Sean, Poseidon (Apolo), Shabba56 (for the amazing Disturbed), Logan, VoltageScape (Tyler, Ben & Isaac) - hope you remember me Ex-Moderator Ags Vs Claws, legitimate, James Lawrence, Mister Maggot, Sway, Zelt, Rs Wiki, Tizen, Tyro, Zach, Rising King, and a few others at the back of my head...[/b]
[b]Thanks For Reading,
Owner Of HumidityX,[/b]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/259v0pg.png[/img]Humid[/center]

item.title: HumidityX 667/720 Official Release
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:8, topic:468197”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=585159.msg4158776#msg4158776 date=1352865595]

There was over 10 anti-leeches

In this source there are 5 Anti leeches.

I do NOT give permission to ANYONE re releasing a fixed version of my source or releasing my source anywhere but Rune-Server.

[/quote]
I will list the anti-leeches I remember, definitely more than 5.

  1. db-cd in run.cmd. db-cd is not a command -cd is so theres 1.
  2. 4 JAR files were missing in the lib folder.
  3. Missing bracket in buttonhandler Class.
  4. Missing method and bracket in commands Class.
  5. Missing method and initializer in Launcher Class, which I had to re-write.
  6. When you die you do not teleport to respawn area.
  7. NPC’s have no emotes.
    There were more I just can’t remember.[/quote]

Read full topic
